Conditional and unconditional cash transfers
Food aid
3. Trade
Taxation, subsidies or direct pricing to influence prices 
and encourage healthy eating and lifelong physical 
activity
Approaches, i.e. stepwise or comprehensive, to reduce 
the impact of marketing of foods high in saturated fats, 
trans-fatty acids, free sugars or salt to children
Provision of food in public institutions
Implementation of the International Code of Marketing of 
Breast-milk Substitutes
